basics.name: Dylan Swoope
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced sawyer, practiced Kung Fu for several years, and regularly cut my own hair.

highlights: Maintained and added features to mobile apps, internal API, and main web application
Developed mobile applications and shared libraries in React Native for iOS
Participated in Agile development cycles, sprint planning, and platform level decision making
Collaborated with design team to develop UI and interpret state complexities
Expanded unit testing suites across internal mobile libraries and central API
Helped introduce state-management systems into web and mobile applications
Built customer payments portal and integration with Stripe
Delivered consistent progress with my team to complete a full front-end platform rewrite
Contributed to business logic of the platformâ€™s REST APIs across the microservices architecture
Built public static pages from mock-ups using Wordpress and responsive front-end libraries
Constructed modular UI components and integrated them into the end-user web application
Adhered to standards of functional programming, data immutability, and composition-style development
Unit tested server side libraries and maintained testing suites for individual front end components
Practiced continuous delivery during Agile development cycles
Collected surface water data and prepared relevant reports using established USGS methods
Processed records in USGS database to ensure ongoing accuracy of data displayed on public websites
Provided assistance to partner organizations and river authorities with fieldwork & data management
Deployed as member of regionally organized teams on 14-day fire assignments in remote locations
Maintained proficiency in fire engine operation, fire suppression tactics, and wilderness first aid skills
Supervised and instructed crew of up to 10 and groups of volunteers of up to 30
Oversaw and managed timelines for project completion, ensured specific client standards and specifications were met; maintained safety of crew

projects.name: Texans.vote
projects.summary: A social media contest platform aimed at encouraging civic engagement and increasing voter turnout.

projects.name: Health Inspector
projects.summary: A web app that retrieves restaurant health inspection scores from the City of Austin data portal
